name: input-country6
description: Stage 6 - Input Country - Two Way Data binding

countryName.description: Property to hold the name of the selected country; a string can be passed in, or a data bound expression

label.description: This property is used to specify the text to be shown as the label (aka prompt) for the input field

countrySelectionHandler.description: Provide a function to be called back whenever a country has been selected
